verbs.description: Stormy Daniels attorney Michael Avenatti [V: is] alleging that a Russian oligarch reimbursed longtime Trump lawyer Michael Cohen following his payment to the porn star .

Stormy Daniels attorney Michael Avenatti is alleging that a Russian oligarch reimbursed longtime Trump lawyer Michael Cohen [V: following] [ARG2: his payment to the porn star] .
